com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.impl

Class DataAccessObjectImpl<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.logitopia.jmortar.core.persistence.dao.impl.DataAccessObjectImpl<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DataAccessObject<T>

    public class DataAccessObjectImpl<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements DataAccessObject<T>
    The DataAccessObjectImpl class is an abstract implementation of DataAccessObject that manages DataAccessComponent and persistent interaction.

    • Method Detail

      • addEntity

        public DataResponse addEntity(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> values)
        Add an entity to the persistent storage. The values provided will be used to build the entity. The value structure will consist of a map of all values to be stored. Any child entities will have their keys stored as a Map (this will be passed on to the child entity persistence manager).
        Specified by:
        addEntity in interface DataAccessObject<T>
        Parameters:
        values - The values that make up the entities key.
        Returns:
        The DataResponse that contains the response to the operation.

      • deleteEntity

        public DataResponse deleteEntity(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> keyValues)
        Delete an entity to the persistent storage.
        Specified by:
        deleteEntity in interface DataAccessObject<T>
        Parameters:
        keyValues - The values that make up the entities unique key. That model will be deleted.
        Returns:
        The DataResponse that contains the response to the operation.

        Specified by:
